EmailTemplate.subject: Containers and the Rise of Microservices
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/self-managing-openshift-turbonomic/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Do you need to deliver better services faster via rapid, iterative application development? Containers and microservices make it possible, but compared to a virtualized IT environment, a containerized environment is highly dynamic with greater density and more layers to manage.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/self-managing-openshift-turbonomic/]]>
While the artifacts have changed the challenges are the same – just more complex. How do you ensure workloads get the resources they need when they need them?
Please let us know <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo-container-platforms/]]> if you would like to learn more about how we can help your organization.
Cheers,
Asena Woodward Sr. Product Marketing Manager, Turbonomic
